title: Versailles: the palace of the sun
brief_description: Presents the man-made beauties of the Palace of Versailles, built for the “Sun-King”, Louis XIV. Shows the famous Hall of Mirrors. Lingers on the many works of sculpture and shows the Trianons, the Queen’s Hamlet, and the great gardens designed by La Notre.
